hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Shadow Temple Small Key# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #fairy outside Ganon's Castle# holds #a Red Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Phantom Ganon# holds...^ #a Hookshot# and #a Map of the Shadow Temple#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Shadow Temple#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #chests past Dark Link# in the Water Temple hold...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Map of the Water Temple#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Fire Temple Compass# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #the Kokiri Sword#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Deku Nut Capacity# and #Deku Stick Capacity#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #the Fire Medallion#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 5 Bottom

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: I hear Termina is a great spot for a vacation!

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #final treasure of Ice Cavern# is #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #a Shadow Temple Small Key# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #inside Ganon's Castle#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: Did you know that Gorons understood SRM long before speedrunners did?

LH (Lab).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Prelude of Light#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that in the #Sacred Forest Meadow#, Sheik teaches #the Serenade of Water#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Biggoron Sword#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Biggoron Sword#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Biggoron Sword# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Zelda's Lullaby# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree Compass Room Side Chest

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Fire Temple#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #5# major items.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Prelude of Light#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #4# major items.
